nodes.text: Solida Hesk was a female Zabrak businesswoman who worked for the Hutt Cartel during the Galactic War.

In 3638 BBY, she and the mining corporation were aiding the Hutt Cartel to study Isotope-5 and sell out the planet. She was hosting a summit to three Hutt Clan lords - Prodoranya, Manju, and Khobisho - at her resort estate on one of Makeb's mesas. However, an Imperial strike team gained access to the estate and the Hesk corporation's records. The team were able to determine that a large stockpile of isotope-5 was being held in a vault designated "Stronghold One", initially designed for the planetary treasury. Solida encountered the Imperial strike team and was executed.
